DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Patient Refusal to Participate Exposure Restriction To Member Of High Risk Population Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response to questions which are necessary to allow clinical study participation that address the patientÂ’s' refusal to take part in the limitations of exposing something, as outlined in the study protocol, to a population group that has a greater chance of contracting a disease or disorder.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Patient Refusal to Participate Exposure Restriction To Member Of High Risk Population
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Declining to take part in activities or procedures that are available to, or requested or expected of, an individual._The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience._Anything that limits; a limitation._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._An indication that a person is part of a population group that has a greater chance of contracting a disease or disorder.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Property.preferredName: Patient Refusal to Participate Exposure Restriction To Member Of High Risk Population
Property.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:Declining to take part in activities or procedures that are available to, or requested or expected of, an individual.:The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience.:Anything that limits; a limitation.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:An indication that a subject is part of a population group that has a greater chance of contracting a disease or disorder.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
Declining to take part in activities or procedures that are available to, or requested or expected of, an individual.
The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
An indication that a person is part of a population group that has a greater chance of contracting a disease or disorder.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is patient unwilling to minim
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient unwilling to minimize exposure with his/her blood or other body fluids to individuals who are at higher risks for HSV-1 induced complications such as immunosuppressed individuals, individuals known to have HIV infection, pregnant women, or children under the age of 1 year, during talimogene laherparepvec (T-VEC) treatment and through 30 days after the last dose of talimogene laherparepvec (T-VEC)?

DataElement.changeDescription: 4/6/17  tt, approved/released. 3/30/17 tt. 10056. Fixed apostrope in definition 3/8/2018 DW
